message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which is tailored to meet your specific needs. This unique offering is valued at $12000 by us, reflecting its high quality and exclusivity. Given its exceptional features and benefits, I believe it could significantly enhance your operations or personal endeavors. Considering its value, I am extending this opportunity to you at a special introductory price of $10000. I look forward to your consideration and the possibility of bringing this valuable asset into your possession.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you place on your product. However, given my budget constraints, I am only able to consider products within a $9500 price range. I hope this revised offer aligns better with your considerations.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your budget constraints and appreciate your interest in our product. In light of your offer, I would like to present a compromise. Our product, while valuable, is deeply rooted in its unique features and the expertise behind it. Given these factors, I propose we adjust the price to $9750. This reflects a reasonable compromise between our initial valuation and your budget. I hope this offer meets your expectations and allows us to move forward with the transaction.
